sentences.en: Against Marseille it was more or less the same.
sentences.cn: 打马赛的时候多多少少也这样.

sentences.en: Arsenal are believed to have negotiated a preliminary agreement with Marseille for midfielder Franck Ribery.
sentences.cn: 阿森纳和马赛就中场球员里贝里达成了初步协议.

sentences.en: Bianconeri coach Didier Deschamps sees Malouda as an affordable alternative to Marseille wing ace Franck Ribery.
sentences.cn: 斑马军团主帅迪迪埃·德尚视马卢达为马赛边路好手里贝里的替代者.

sentences.en: But I heard that Olympic Marseille is the year's winner of Champions Cup.
sentences.cn: 我听说欧洲冠军杯今年的得主是奥林匹克马赛队.

sentences.en: But I heard that Olympic Marseille is this year's winner of Champions Cup.
sentences.cn: 但我听说欧洲冠军杯今年的得主是奥林匹克马赛队.

sentences.en: Fowler takes over the shirt from Djibril Cisse following the Frenchman's move to Marseille.

sentences.en: I spent oneand then got a move to the biggest club in France - Marseille.
sentences.cn: 我在甘冈踢了一年,然后转会去了法国最大的俱乐部 -- 马赛.

sentences.en: IN a freezer in Marseille, France, sits a virus that is by far the biggest virus known to science; it is huge, around thirty times bigger than the rhinovirus that gives you a common cold.
sentences.cn: 在法国马赛的一个冷藏库里，栖息着一种病毒，出奇的大，是科学上已知的最大病毒；说它巨大，大约比令你患感冒的鼻病毒大三十倍。

sentences.en: It is believed the girl lives in Marseille and was travelling with her mother to the Comoros.
sentences.cn: 确信这名小女孩住在马赛勒正准备和她妈妈一起到科摩罗斯旅行。

sentences.en: On their way back to Marseille they spoke very little.
sentences.cn: 返回马赛的路上，他们没怎么说话。

sentences.en: The Biancocelesti reached the last stage of this mini - tournament after defeating Marseille 3 - 1 on Monday.
sentences.cn: 在3:1击败马赛之后,拉齐奥晋级了迪拜杯的决赛.

sentences.en: The trip from Marseille to Tunis takes about 21 hours via a route that tracks just west of Corsica.
sentences.cn: 这趟从马赛到突尼斯的航程，经由科西嘉岛以西的航道，大约需21小时。

sentences.en: Then he goes and scores one of his best ever goals in Marseille.
sentences.cn: 随后他继续前进,并在马赛打入了他有史以来最好的进球之一.

sentences.en: They played in Madrid ( 2008 ), Australian Open ( 2008 ) and Marseille ( 2006 ) - All hard court events.
sentences.cn: 他们在2008年马德里和澳网,以及2006年的马赛相遇过,这些全是硬地赛场.

sentences.en: They were not the casual offers that the prostitutes of Marseille received as their daily currency.
sentences.cn: 这一切,与马赛街头那些马路天使们随时都会遇到的肆意挑逗,是截然不同的.

sentences.en: United will also face Sporting Lisbon and Dynamo Kiev, while Liverpool face Porto, Marseille and Besitkas.

sentences.en: Week in two goals against Marseille, Gerrard was Liverpool scored in the 98 th and 99 th goals.

sentences.en: Yes, unfortunately Bill lost his voice after the show in Marseille.
sentences.cn: 是的, 很不幸Bill在Marseille的表演之后失去了他的声音.
